name: Edengard
description: A quaint town at the northernmost tip of the Crimson Isles, south of Moofiltonia.

children.name: The Red Olive Inn
children.description: A rustic three-story building made of cobblestone and accented with timber. A weathered sign hangs above a timber door and reads 'The Red Olive Inn'.

children.name: the lobby
children.description: A quaint room with a large window, providing natural light. There are a few doors leading to adjacent rooms. A reception desk is placed against the back wall.

children.name: the tavern
children.description: A typical, cosy tavern. The center of the room has many round, wooden tables, the right side of the room has several booths, the left side of the room has a small stage and there is a bar counter against the back wall.

children.name: Bazza's office
children.description: A small room with a desk in the middle. A painting of a family of halflings rests on the back wall. A few pieces of parchment litter the desk.

children.name: Bhelram's General Store
children.description: A small shop that appears to sell anything and everything including food, clothes, and essential supplies.

children.name: the lobby
children.description: A cosy but cluttered room with shelves and racks featuring every type of day to day good imaginable. There is a booth in the middle for paying the clerk.

children.name: the staff room
children.description: A small dimly-lit room with cargo boxes stacked all around the rim.

children.name: Bhelram's room
children.description: A minimalist bedroom with a single bed, featuring ornately decorated metal dwarven bedposts, and the bare essential furniture.
